channel.title: Project sony aka black pearl v2 attack problem help fast plz
channel.description: hey i got project sony aka black pearl v2 but as you may know or may not know when you attack an npc or player it doe's not attack the npc or player with a movement so it only hit's but doe's not show it attacks. can someone help me witht his give a tut on how to do this? c&p would be GReat thx alot also how do i make the login interface change so the text doe's not keep saying welcome to project sony

item.title: Project sony aka black pearl v2 attack problem help fast plz

edit and it’s for every weapon
plz help?

and where the seccond question and first one in client.java?? on the source?

item.title: Project sony aka black pearl v2 attack problem help fast plz
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

lolig:

how can i add the animation? well on players it work i’m not talking about specs cos specs work but normal attack also works on players but not npcs and how you mean for the seccond question?

Edit the wepAnim() method in the client class.
